author: andreassosilo
title: Cardano Hub Indonesia - Workshops
description: Indonesian crypto adoption is happening now but people still ++lack awareness on Cardano & it's Ecosystem++ (Catalyst, Plutus, Atala PRISM, etc)
solution: Building Cardano Indonesia Community by providing information & knowledge via workshops, led by Indonesian collaborators themselves.
experience: Cardano Ambassador, Eastern Hemisphere Town Hall Team Member, Catalyst School Extended Team Member, Cardano Hub Jakarta Meetup Organizer
